channel.title: What are you most excited to see?
channel.description:
What are you looking forward to seeing in black mesa source
I would say black mesa in its prime, before the Resonance Cascade, and the lambda core.

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Black_Hawk
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

Mushrooms everywhere!

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_hlberg
item.description:
Nightblade+--:

The audio aspect is so often overlooked in games. I’m super excited to know that so much has gone into this aspect of the game!

This.
I simply love the audio in some games. A great example is Battlefield Bad Company 2, the audio is absolutely stunning.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Nightblade
item.description:
λhlberg:

200$ headphones, the listening experience can’t get better… And no, they are not Beats by Dr.Dre. I don’t buy shit.

I’m buying a Razer Tiamat 7.1 headset specifically for BMS and the rest of the HL series. I only hope the onboard audio of the Asus Maximus V Formula Z77 does it justice.

The audio aspect is so often overlooked in games. I’m super excited to know that so much has gone into this aspect of the game!
It therefore makes me a little sad that there won’t be any raging thunderstorms throughout the game ( :’( ), as that would be truly awesome to hear. I looove storms, I go for walks in them whenever one starts.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Bjossi
item.description:
Sweet! I’ll be sure to turn up the volume and bring out the big listening gear.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
Agreed. The impact of the train ride on my brain remains unsurpassed, and it will never happen again.
It was 1998, it had never been done before, and little did we know at that point in the game that the rest of the game would be full of even more innovative stuff that Half-Life is now known for.

So Black Mesa Inbound is what I’m mostly looking forward to.

Off topic: Unreal’s second level (Nyleve’s Falls) also made an impression I’ll never ever forget: in the beginning, the moment you leave the crashed spaceship (Vortex Rikers) and you come into the open air: the atmosphere, the beautiful sights, bunnies, flying creatures, but especially the music.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Nightblade
item.description:
^ Ha! I knew I wasn’t alone on this. For me it’s like the breath before the storm so to speak.
As for which weapon I am most looking for to wielding that has got to be the Gluon Gun. As Bjossi says there is nothing quite like the feel of a weapon that has such a kick it makes you a little scared. :rabies:

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Suddenly I just thought it trough, and realised that it seems there is nothing in Black Mesa that I won’t be satisfied with.
But I’m really excited to see the monorail ride tbh.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: KiLlEr
item.description:
I am excited about the first chapter before the resonance cascade, it seems that there’s unlimited stuff to discover
And I want to see the resonance cascade itself and the following random teleports

item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Bjossi
item.description:
I liked the pulse gun’s sound the most, with a good subwoofer every single shot from that thing felt like I was being punched in the stomach. Guns that feel powerful make me feel like a god when firing them. The shotgun and .357 are also awesome in this regard.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
Bjossi:

If the gun sounds in Black Mesa will be as good as in Half-Life 2 I will be in for a treat.

The pistol had the best sound effect in the whole game, it was very unique, I enjoyed hearing it in the beta trailers, and codename gordon before hl2 released.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: Nightblade
item.description:
I think the coolest character interaction moment has got to be the intoduction for the Tau Cannon - a.k.a. Gauss Gun.
Kevin & Mike’s performance is imo far superior to the original rendition.
I actually heard both and was surprised to find that out.

Great work guys, can’t wait to see it in action.

Read full topic
item.source: What are you most excited to see?

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Cpl_Shephard:

Aww, how sad… Well its alright, valve never said that Dr. Magnusson was the guy banging on the vendo machine.

Magnusson will be mentioned by the people in the room with the casserole if you blow it up though.

Read full topic

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: _amp_8706_lpha
item.description:
Yeah, I think I’m most excited to see how all the voice acting and choreography looks, sounds and plays out.
Also most importantly, I’m ready to be beat in the face with nostalgia.

item.title: What are you most excited to see?
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
I am actually most exited to see the iconic Half-Life 2 characters, Eli Vance, Issac Kliener, and Barney Calhoun, even though they don’t play a major part.
